title: What Comes First . . . A Conversation with Dan Rosensweig and Sam Altman | ASU+GSV 2023
description:
Chegg CEO and President Dan Rosensweig, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, and GSV Founder and CEO Michael Moe have a conversation about the future of education and AI in EDU at the 2023 ASU+GSV Summit.
 
As President, CEO, and Co-Chairperson of Chegg, Dan Rosensweig has helped to transform the popular textbook rental service into a leading provider of digital learning services. By leveraging technology, mobility, and connected networks, Chegg has now become a 24/7 learning partner by offering a suite of high-quality, low-cost, personalized and on-demand educational resources that help students maximize the return on their investment in education and support them on their journey from learning to earning.
 
Sam Altman is the co-founder and CEO of OpenAI, the AI research and deployment company behind ChatGPT and DALLÂ·E. Sam was president of the early-stage startup accelerator Y Combinator from 2014 to 2019.  In 2015, Sam co-founded OpenAI as a nonprofit research lab with the mission to build general-purpose artificial intelligence that benefits all humanity. The company remains governed by the nonprofit and its original charter today.
